description.value:
On your turn, when you score a critical hit or reduce a creature to 0 hit points, you can immediately attempt to hinder other threats around you. A number of creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you or the target equal to your proficiency modifier must make a Charisma saving throw (DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + the ability modifier used) or become hindered until the end of their next turn. While hindered a creature cannot take reactions and can only take an action or a bonus action, not both. You may only impose the saving throw from Thwart once per turn on a creature.

By default this feat uses Strength for the saving throw DC, if you wish to use a different ability modifier instead, update this feat after it has been added to your character sheet.

activation.condition: when you score a critical hit or reduce a creature to 0 hit points
